implementation.useCase: SK Telecom implemented Claude in two key ways: 1) In-Call Assist to provide agents with real-time document search and answers during customer calls, and 2) Post-Call Processing to automate routine tasks like summarization, topic classification, to-do list generation, and sentiment analysis after calls.
implementation.problem: SKT needed to maintain their industry-leading customer service while addressing several challenges: limited call center hours (9-6 Monday-Friday), different preferences between older customers (phone) and younger customers (chat), and reducing the cognitive burden on overwhelmed agents while maintaining service quality across regional dialects and cultural nuances.
implementation.integrationMethod: Claude in Amazon Bedrock, integrated with SKT's in-house RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) model

metrics.metric: increase in quality rating of LLM responses by human agents in in-call assistance
metrics.sourceText: • The quality rating of LLM responses by human agents in in-call assistance increased by 34%

metrics.metric: decrease in the proportion of low-quality responses in the Telco fine-tuned model compared to the base model
metrics.sourceText: • The proportion of low-quality responses in the Telco fine-tuned model decreased by 68% compared to the base model

metrics.metric: response quality in post-call processing compared to that of human agents
metrics.sourceText: • The response quality in post-call processing is approximately 89% of that of human agents

metrics.metric: improvement in performance of the Telco LLM through integration with Claude
metrics.sourceText: This integration significantly enhanced service capabilities, boosting the performance of the Telco LLM from 3.3 to over 4.3.
Agent evaluation scores increased significantly from 3.3 to mid-4s, meeting SKT's rigorous standards for service deployment.

metrics.metric: consecutive years SKT has maintained the top position in the National Customer Satisfaction Index (NCSI)
metrics.sourceText: SK Telecom, which has maintained the top position in the National Customer Satisfaction Index (NCSI) for 27 years, is leveraging Claude in Amazon Bedrock to further enhance its renowned customer service operations.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Reduced cognitive burden on overwhelmed agents through real-time assistance
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: "We recognized that our customer service agents are stressed, overwhelmed. We wanted human-in-the-loop technology to make their lives better," said Davis.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude's warmth and emotional intelligence provided more relatable and creative responses
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: "Claude is more relatable and creative," said Davis. This warmth and emotional intelligence proved especially valuable in Korean customer service, where cultural nuance and empathy are essential.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Automated routine post-call processing while maintaining quality through human oversight
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText:
• Automates routine post-call processing, including summarization, topic classification, to-do list generation, and sentiment analysis
• Maintains human oversight of results
• Streamlines workflow while ensuring quality

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude's focus on safety aligned with SKT's priority on brand protection
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: "For us, brand safety is crucial—anything that tarnishes the brand is just a no-go. Anthropic's huge focus on safety really stood out," said Davis.

technicalDetails.architecture: Integration of Claude in Amazon Bedrock with SKT's in-house RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) model for end-to-end retrieval-augmented generation
technicalDetails.challenges: Performance requirements including throughput and latency, maintaining brand safety, and ensuring cultural sensitivity across regional dialects
technicalDetails.solutions: Amazon Bedrock enabled seamless serving of custom models and rapid scaling of resources, close collaboration between AWS and Anthropic facilitated swift issue resolution, and Claude's natural communication abilities provided the cultural sensitivity needed
technicalDetails.scale: Serving millions of Korean customers, supporting SKT's position as Korea's #1 customer service provider
